attributes.action: Make 'Natural Engineering' (or, Wilderness Skills) a mandatory part of schooling
attributes.additional_details: All of us are intuitively captivated by the adventurous, innate area of natural engineering. As well as being instinctive, it is neurologically proven as a better way for a human being to live. And we crave it...We all have a right to be taught how to interact with the natural elements, and we are at a point in time in which we have an astounding amount of knowledge on how to do so in a sustainable, ethical manner. Natural Engineering should be intrinsic to schools & to our culture as humans.
attributes.background: Natural Enginering consists of material(tools,clothes)& soil science, foraging&ethnobotany(food,deodorant), building skills, permaculture, sustainability and many more areas of study and practice that allow us to interact with, and to live lovingly within the natural areas of our beautiful country.
